document.heading: Closing of a Public Alley in Square 371, S.O. 96-202, Act of 1998

history.narrative: Law 12-267, the “Closing of a Public Alley in Square 371, S.O. 96-202, Act of 1998,” was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 12-800. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on December 1, 1998, and December 15, 1998, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on December 23, 1998, it was assigned Act No. 12-576 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review. D.C. Law 12-267 became effective on April 27, 1999.
